name: Level Mount Full Motion Single Arm Desktop Mount

reviews.name: Level Mount Desktop Mount With a Full Motion Mount Fits 10-30" Monitors/TVs - DCDSK30SJ
reviews.reviewText: Easy to assemble. Great product to free up desk space.
reviews.title: Perfect placement

reviews.name: Level Mount Desktop Mount With a Full Motion Mount Fits 10-30" Monitors/TVs - DCDSK30SJ
reviews.reviewText: Got it all together from the limited instructions after about 30 minutes. Bolted it on the table and the screen was not level. Saw no way to level it, The adjustments tilting forward and backward would not hold properly so it kept tilting down. Returned item and bought the NEO-Flex. What a big difference. The Neo-Flex was easy to assemble and works so much easier, they put a lot of thought into making the NEO-Flex.
reviews.title: Really bad

reviews.name: Level Mount Desktop Mount With a Full Motion Mount Fits 10-30" Monitors/TVs - DCDSK30SJ
reviews.reviewText: I've seen good and bad reviews but this product really seems to work for me. It has good quality parts. The only draw back is the lack of detail in the assembly instructions.
reviews.title: it works for me
